tool_description: Translate from English to Elvish languages Sindarin or Quenya. Elvish is a collection of fictional languages spoken by an immortal species in middle earth  in the movie Lord of the Rings. Sindarin and Quenya are the main Elvish languages. This API allows for conversion from English to Sindarin or Quenya.
name: Elvish Translator
title: Elvish Translator

api_list.name: Quenya Translator
api_list.description: Translate from English to Elvish Quenya

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: I am Arwen - I've come to help you. Hear my voice... Come back to the light.

api_list.name: Sindarin Translator
api_list.description: Translate from English to Elvish Sindarin

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: The world is changed; I can feel it in the water, I can feel it in the earth, I can smell it in the air.
